item.title: 零售销售增长强劲，S&P 500 指数屡创新高
item.description: 由于 6 月份零售销售反弹，缓解了人们对消费支出放缓的担忧，美国股市周四震荡走高，接近历史新高。【原文：US stocks drifted higher on Thursday to trade near fresh all-time highs as retail sales rebounded in June, easing concerns about a slowdown in consumer spending.】

item.title: 伊拉克与库尔德人就石油计划达成一致，向出口协议迈出一步
item.description: 伊拉克批准了一项库尔德半自治地区向巴格达输送石油的计划，这是向恢复中断两年多的出口迈出的一步。【原文：Iraq approved a plan for its semi-autonomous Kurdish region to transfer oil to Baghdad, a step toward resuming exports that have been halted for more than two years.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒称在 "一段时间 "内保持利率不变是合适的
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里亚娜-库格勒说【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said】

item.title: 意大利市场管理局考虑暂停联合信贷银行对 BPM 的竞购
item.description: 意大利市场监管机构 Consob 正在分析是否要暂停意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）对 Banco BPM SpA 的收购要约，因为意大利一家法院对政府对该交易提出的一些要求提出了质疑。【原文：Italy’s market regulator Consob is analyzing whether to suspend UniCredit SpA’s takeover bid for Banco BPM SpA, after an Italian court challenged some of the requirements imposed by the government on the deal.】

item.title: 网络安全老板对人工智能攻击和滥用的担忧与日俱增
item.description: 一项新的调查显示，近四分之一的网络安全公司老板表示，他们的公司在过去一年中遭遇了人工智能的攻击。【原文：Nearly a quarter of cybersecurity bosses said their companies have experienced an attack powered by artificial intelligence in the past year, according to a new survey in which AI risk emerged as the defining challenge.】

item.title: 美国零售销售大幅增长，超出预期
item.description: 美国零售销售反弹，出现了广泛的增长，可能会缓和一些对消费者支出缩减的担忧。【原文：US retail sales rebounded in a broad advance, potentially tempering some concerns about a retrenchment in consumer spending.】

item.title: 美国首次申请失业救济人数连续第五周下降
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数连续第五周下降，降至四月中旬以来的最低水平，显示出就业市场的韧性。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits declined for a fifth straight week to the lowest level since mid-April, showing a resilient job market.】

item.title: Couche-Tard 无法超越 Seven & I，因为其自身的逆风也越来越大
item.description: Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. 终止了对日本 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. ended its pursuit of Japan’s Seven & i Holdings Co., with the Canadian retailer’s ambitions giving way to mounting pressures in its own business and a protracted share slump.】

item.title: 凯文-沃什称美联储的独立性 "至关重要"，但也有限
item.description: 美联储下任主席候选人凯文-沃什（Kevin Warsh）表示，中央银行的独立性 "至关重要"。【原文：Kevin Warsh, a candidate to be the next Federal Reserve chair, said independence for the central bank is “essential.”】

item.title: 拥有 239 年历史的机构购买英国政府债券，数百万英国债务被一笔勾销
item.description: 在一个拥有两个世纪历史的政府机构将私人捐赠者的礼物投资于今年到期的金边债券后，英国的债务储备将被抹去数百万英镑。【原文：Millions of pounds will be wiped off the UK’s debt stockpile after a two-centuries-old government body invested a gift from private donors into a gilt maturing this year.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团将从威尔玛合资公司股权出售中获得 13 亿美元收益
item.description: 阿达尼企业有限公司（Adani Enterprises Ltd. ）预计将通过出售其在 AWL Agri Business Ltd. 的剩余股份获得 1,087 亿卢比（13 亿美元）的收益，因为这家从港口到电力的企业集团将退出非核心业务，专注于可再生能源和机场等支柱基础设施业务。【原文：Adani Enterprises Ltd. expects to get 108.7 billion rupees ($1.3 billion) by selling its residual stake in AWL Agri Business Ltd. as the ports-to-power conglomerate exits non-core activities to focus on its mainstay infrastructure businesses like renewables and airports.】

item.title: 俄罗斯取得期待已久的抗击通胀胜利
item.description: 6 月份，俄罗斯的月度物价增长速度明显放缓，这是第一个有意义的迹象，表明在长期实行超紧缩货币政策之后，央行与通胀的斗争可能正在出现转机。【原文：Monthly price growth in Russia slowed significantly in June, the first meaningful sign that the central bank’s battle against inflation may be turning a corner after a protracted period of ultra-tight monetary policy.】

item.title: 交易员押注英国央行更大幅度降息，目标回报率达 1,000
item.description: 一些交易商在英国期权市场下了赌注，如果英国央行无视通胀率创下 18 个月新高，并在今年实施比利率定价更多的降息措施，那么他们将获得超过 1000% 的回报。【原文：Some traders have placed wagers in the UK options market that could net a more than 1,000% return if the Bank of England ignores inflation at an eighteen month high and delivers more cuts this year than rates pricing suggests.】

item.title: 穆迪称关税风险使更多企业濒临破产
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）的一份报告显示，由于美国贸易和关税的不确定性导致信贷状况恶化，违约风险最大的公司数量创下了 11 个月以来的新高。【原文：The number of companies at the greatest risk of defaulting are at an 11-month high, as uncertainty around US trade and tariffs worsened credit conditions, according to a Moody’s Ratings report.】

item.title: 加密货币盗窃和黑客攻击事件已超过去年全年总数
item.description: 朝鲜拉扎罗斯集团对 Bybit 交易所的 15 亿美元黑客攻击导致今年从数字平台上盗取的资金比 2024 年全年还要多。【原文：The $1.5 billion hack of the exchange Bybit attributed to North Korea’s Lazarus Group has resulted in more funds being swiped from digital platforms already this year than in all of 2024.】

item.title: 前伦丁公司首席执行官 Rockandel 加入 Infor，以抓住矿业交易机会
item.description: 加拿大金属生产商隆丁矿业公司（Lundin Mining Corp. ）前首席执行官彼得-罗坎德尔（Peter Rockandel）正计划利用近期矿业融资和交易量上升的机会，重新回到银行业。【原文：Peter Rockandel, former chief executive officer of Canadian metals producer Lundin Mining Corp., is planning to capitalize on the recent uptick in mining financing and deal flow as he returns to his banking roots.】

item.title: 新加坡外长：美国关税有可能使全球贸易陷入 "掰手腕比赛 "的风险
item.description: 新加坡外交部长维维安-巴拉克里希南（Vivian Balakrishnan）表示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统对其合作伙伴征收关税之后，全球贸易有可能变成一场 "双边掰手腕比赛"。【原文：Global trade risks becoming a “bilateral arm-wrestling match” following President Donald Trump’s approach of slapping tariffs on its partners, according to Singapore’s Foreign Minister Vivian Balakrishnan.】

item.title: 美国的这些地点是下一代核反应堆的 "黄金地段
item.description:
这些地块 已经获得了新建原子工厂的联邦批准，有可能加快未来的 建设。【原文：

The land parcels already have federal approval for new atomic plants, potentially speeding up future construction.

】

item.title: 南非财政部长称 20 国集团即将就公报达成协议
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）表示，20 国集团发达经济体即将就公报达成协议。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana said the Group of 20 advanced economies are nearing a deal on a communiqué.】

item.title: 富达为另类投资基金筹集超过 7 亿美元资金
item.description: 富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）募集了第二只机会主义信贷基金，作为全球第三大资产管理公司，该公司正在扩大其对另类投资的投入。【原文：Fidelity Investments raised a second opportunistic credit fund as the world’s third-largest asset manager expands its push into alternatives.】

item.title: 摩根大通贝纳穆称美联储独立是个 "神话
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The idea that the Federal Reserve operates free from political pressures is a “myth” and US stocks are likely to keep soaring on bets that interest rate cuts are coming, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Ilan Benhamou.】

item.title: 瑞典振动编码公司 Lovable 估值达 18 亿美元
item.description: Lovable 是一家瑞典人工智能初创公司，致力于简化软件开发流程，该公司已完成 2 亿美元的融资，成为欧洲最新的独角兽企业。【原文：Lovable, a Swedish artificial intelligence startup that streamlines software development, raised a $200 million fundraising round, making it Europe’s newest unicorn.】

item.title: 欧盟提议联合借款为 4000 亿欧元危机工具融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，欧盟委员会周三提出的 4000 亿欧元（4630 亿美元）危机工具将通过联合借贷的方式进行融资。【原文：The €400 billion ($463 billion) crisis tool proposed by the European Commission on Wednesday would be financed using joint borrowing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员评估鲍威尔面临压力的影响，美债下滑
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的最新攻击引发市场担忧，国债收益率下滑。【原文：Treasuries slipped as markets grappled with the fallout from US President Donald Trump’s latest attacks on Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团出售德比尔斯公司的交易激怒了博茨瓦纳利益相关者
item.description: 知情人士称，英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）出售戴比尔斯公司的处理方式激怒了博茨瓦纳，博茨瓦纳拥有这家钻石生产商 15%的股份，因为博茨瓦纳政府认为没有与英美资源集团进行适当协商。【原文：Anglo American Plc’s handling of the De Beers sale has angered Botswana, which owns 15% of the diamond producer, because the government believes that it hasn’t been properly consulted, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 维塔利农场以更高的价格和激励措施吸引美国蛋农
item.description: 美国最大的牧场饲养鸡蛋品牌正试图吸引更多的农民，包括帮助支付因关税而可能上涨的建筑成本。【原文：The largest brand of pasture-raised eggs in the US is trying to bring in more farmers, including by helping cover construction costs that could rise because of tariffs.】

item.title: 微软在聊天机器人竞赛中落后于 OpenAI

item.title: 长滩港计划如何最终超越竞争对手洛杉矶
item.description: 站在俯瞰南加州圣佩德罗湾的码头上，外人很难分清长滩港的尽头和洛杉矶港的起点。但是，构成西半球最大海运枢纽的货运门户却是截然不同的。【原文：Standing on the docks overlooking San Pedro Bay in Southern California, it’s hard for an outsider to tell where the Port of Long Beach ends and the Port of Los Angeles begins. But the cargo gateways that make up the Western Hemisphere’s largest maritime hub are distinct.】
